title: Chapter 1405 - A Battlefield Of The Heart, I Compete With Myself
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1405 - A Battlefield Of The Heart, I Compete With Myself

The middle-aged man in ornate robes suddenly felt as if the edge of a sword were right up against his throat. His hair stood on end.

He looked at Family Head Hong Tianyun pleadingly. “Family Head, I—”

Swoosh!

A streak of sword di descended, dispersing his soul.

Su Yi flicked the flat of his sword. “That was well-deserved punishment. Any objections?”

Hong Tianyun and the others’ chests heaved, and their expressions were as unsightly as could be.

They’d seen tyrannical attitudes before, but never anything like this! Su Yi left no room for negotiation at all, and he killed at the drop of a hat!

Meanwhile, Mo Qingchou thoughtfully rushed up to support Qing Tang. She said gently, “Miss Qing Tang, please come with me.”

She then led Qing Tang away. From beginning to end, no one dared intercept them.

This filled Mo Qingchou’s heart with emotion. Throughout the Flying Immortal Forbidden Zone, what faction could suppress the Hong Family’s bluster?

Who could have forced the Hong Family to swallow their anger and endure?

No one!

Yet now, Su Yi had done just that. He’d cut down their gates and forced the Hong Family to avert their gazes before him!

However, Mo Qingchou was still confused. She’d assumed that...
original_title: Chapter 1405 - A Battlefield of the Heart, I Compete with Myself
